评论详情: Got this for my holiday party because I didn’t wanna do a coat. It kept me warm the whole time and added  a great style to my outfit. Love love it!

It was rough and more brownish. It was also longer than I thought.  Felt like I was carrying a small dog around. But for trying to dress like my Grandma did in the 50's it worked just fine.

Sophistication, elegance, and amazingly soft. Looks luxurious in real life. There are two adjustable clasp options for adjustments to your shoulders. Also, the large hole opening in the front secures the stole and keep it in place for a romantic look on my shoulders. I ordered the black one. I have tried others; this one is the best! Highly recommend.

This will be used by the bride for an outdoor wedding.  When I first took it out of package I was skeptical that it would fluff out and look good.  I followed the directions provided and used the dryer and a comb.  I also steamed the lining.  It looks great.
Beautiful wrap for an outdoor wedding.

I’m pretty disappointed with this color.I ordered a small white/long hair. And this is the color that came.. it’s like a ivory.. this is not what I was expecting at all .. now I have to return it hopefully I’ll get the right color before my wedding.
This fur stole is beautiful for a reasonable price. It is soft and luxurious. Definitely recommend.
Looked great with my costume and could be used for fancy outfits
Good quality for price ! Bought for wedding day !
This is a very nice faux wrap! It is a great price for the quality. I bought it in brown and white. They both look more expensive then they are.

This was beautiful and warm, and well made. I didn’t end up using it so I returned, but I would definitely buy it again if the occasion comes up.

first, i had to return and reorder this 3 times trying to get the actual color i ordered. each time i got a completely different color, but never the color i ordered. the condition of each order also varied wildly, from in good shape to crushed and wrinkled. even in good condition, i would only wear this as a costume. it looks too fake for a real occasion. not sure why it has so many positive reviews.

I got one for myself for my wedding and I am now getting one for all of my bridesmaids. It came exactly as pictured and if you hang it for like a day then all the wrinkles are gone. The fur is so soft and my daughters are begging me for some as well! It just added that extra something to my winter wedding attire and I can't wait to give my bridesmaids theirs for their gifts. 评论概述: This item was too large but overall good value
评论详情: Too large good value not as soft as I thought it would be. Not as light weight as I thought it would be

评论概述: Finally! A "White" Shawl that's actually White!
评论详情: I have been looking for a white shawl to wear over my dress for a winter wedding. This is the forth shawl I ordered. I was so excited to see that this shawl was actually as advertised - plain white. No colored tips, no overly yellow tint - just white. The "fur" length is long enough to still look luxurious.  The style of this shawl is a little different than the others I have ordered. Instead of bunching up in the middle, it overlaps. There are two options as to how you can wear this shawl: fastening the attached clasp or pulling one end through the slit in the other.  This shawl is a little bigger than I had expected. It sits loose on the shoulders and comes down pretty far on the stomach.  The material is soft. In the brief time I had it out of the packaging, it didn't shed too much.

I originally bought this for my prom dress (second picture) and I got so many compliments on it. It’s lightweight it does ride up your shoulders a little and can get hot but it’s a fur coat after all so it’s expected. The fur does fly around a little but not too much. I put it on again (first picture) for a home photo shoot for insta and everyone loves it. It’s my all time favorite photo of me so far. DEFINITELY BUY!! Insta: imwheeliemariah <3

评论概述: It is a lot longer than I thought but it still looks nice
评论详情: The picture makes it look like it will be smaller but mine was pretty long. It still looks pretty though
Overall, its nice for the money. It felt soft, but it did shed some.  The clasp becomes undone easily so you really have to hold the wrap closed with your hands.

Long hair white is more of an ivory color. The short hair white is pure white. The first picture is the long hair and you can see compared to a white dress it is off white. The next two pictures are the short hair and long hair colors compared with the flash and without. Both are beautiful! Highly recommend this product.

It was perfect for a cover up for a fall wedding I had. I got lots of compliments on it
Perfect wrap for wedding day glam!

I ordered this a week and a half before my wedding because the weather forecast was in the low 30s. This shawl added a perfect amount of elegance and kept the covered parts of my arms warm enough during photos. My measurements are 140 lbs, 5’-7”, 34B and I ordered a small.
Went great with my 20’s theme outfit . Everyone loved it. Only thing I didn’t like is that it shed a bit on my dress. Worked for the little while I needed to wear it though ! I recommend !

Its beautiful and plush and fits great, but I cannot find a way for it to stop shedding.  It sheds constantly on everything it touches.

The stole is very well made and good quality for the money. I love that it has a couple hook and eyes to adjust the way you want to wear it without having to hold it around your shoulders. The slit is a great touch for a more show stopping, elegant look. It is really nice for faux fur. I definitely recommend this product.

The shawl was well made and arrived quickly, but it is very bulky and looks more like something that would fit for a Viking cosplay than for an outfit on the formal side. Perfect addition to my winter wedding! Kept me warm during pictures and just added an elegant touch for a great price
It does shed however if you just throw it in the dryer with a fabric sheet for about a couple seconds it comes out fluffy and less shedding a lot less ..would buy again

Great for a fancy dinner night out on a budget or a wedding.  Clasp came broken so i have to fix it. And i know what i ordered dont get me wrong but the fur is not the softest but it is still soft. I wish i could have afforded real fur but i needed something in a pinch and this worked well. I would probably order something again in the future i would order a size up tho. Runs a bit  small like i expected but not off by too much. Overall a good experience.

评论概述: Fake fur, but it can look real
评论详情: I bought this for my wedding after having a flash of intuition that my spring wedding would be a little more white.  And I was proven right!  It snowed the day before we go married.  While most of the snow melted off by the afternoon it was still freezing and my strapless dress wasn't particularly warm.  Listen to the directions!!!  After taking the stole out of its wrapping I put it on a no heat dryer cycle, then hung it up on a hanger.  A couple of days before the wedding I steamed the silk back and then used a blow dryer (cool setting) to fluff the fur (I fluffed in the opposite direction of the fur).  It looked wonderful and I received so many compliments!  Some of our guests even asked if it came with my dress (I purchased the white with coffee tips for myself).  I also purchased two of the fox fur stoles for my bridesmaids and they were prefect too!  All three looked great!
Very small
Product description matched what I received. I ordered a LG and it was perfect. It kept me warm for my outdoor February Sedona wedding.
This item gave what it was supposed to gave I felt like a star in this shawl if you want to give that extra glam to your look this product will do just that

Purchased this for an outdoor evening event in Florida. It was very crumpled upon delivery and did not lose its disheveled appearance even after “airing it out” & allowing time to fluff up. It looked like I was trying to wear my dog’s chew toy as a wrap. I was too embarrassed to wear it in public but couldn’t return because I removed the tag. Very disappointed for the price.
This was the wrong color, wrong size, and absolutely terrible quality. Not as pictured. Don’t waste your money.

评论概述: Stunning! Absolutely perfect over my wedding dress.
评论详情: Extremely soft, thick, quality material. No scent, just perfect. Received so many compliments and so many people kept touching and feeling it. It’s irresistible!

Got the long hair version. It’s impossible to get these things looking good. Tried everything in the instructions and most of the tips in the reviews, too. I bought SEVERAL, so I can tell you - there was no one thing or combination of things that could make these stop looking cheap or ratty. If you need a Cruella costume or something, this will work. But it’s not suitable for a wedding or anything formal.
Loved it, though I would still be cold while walking but I was comfortable and super cute
I bought this to wear for a winter wedding. It complimented my sequins jumpsuit perfectly. I’m a plus size girl so it’s hard to find a stole for my size. This fit perfectly.
I wish I had taken a photo. It never would lay correct after multiple days of trying. Purchased to wear to a wedding. I had multiple family member try also and would not work for them either. Beware.
Looks and feels even better than expected.  Bargain!

However, this wrap completely swallowed me! I'm 5'6" with a petite torso and I wear a dress size 0, if that helps anyone. It just needed to be smaller and it would have been perfect.
Great product!! Genuinely kept me warm in the snow on New Years. Also, it was the talk of the town.

Bought this to potentially use for my wedding. Not exactly what I thought it would be. Wound up giving it to the cat. He loves to lay on it like it's his personal rug - so for that, I suppose the money was well spent.

They are not nearly as warm as they look, so I wouldn't rely on them too much for warmth if you are planning an outside/winter wedding. The coats also got a bit crinkly by the end of the evening (seen in photos 3-4). Color in person is accurate to these photos. Overall happy with this purchase!
I had to purchase this for a wedding I was in. This will look so nice in photos! Didn't stay on super well but seems to be good quality.

I bought and used this for my late October wedding in northern IL. Luckily it was not super cold and I didn't need it until later at night, but this was absolutely perfect! It was very comfortable, soft, lightweight, and had no issues at all. I really loved wearing it and felt like it went well with my overall wedding look. I'm keeping it to find an excuse to wear it again!
This was the softest and I loved the color! It was so elegant. I highly recommend this to everyone!
Stayed on my shoulders and kept me warm for the night of my wedding. Got so many compliments!

I was expecting a NEW product for the price and not used.

I bought this shawl for my winter wedding. I first bought the white/long hair (marked as 1) because the white option was out of stock. 评论概述: Size small great for size large shirt
评论详情: I ordered a size small and I normally wear a size medium or large top with a 36 D bra (so I'm not tiny up top). I'm a size 12 pants. It worked great.  Plenty of length to wrap around and go in the slit to close. The clasps worked ok. I might use a broach to secure closed if I was going to me moving a lot. It also kept me pretty warm.

My mom ordered this product for my wedding and I loved it so much I decided to order two for my bridesmaids. The ones that came in for my girls were of significantly worse quality: thinner, sparse fur, etc... Will be returning.

So I’ve ordered 9 of these for my wedding. I have a plus size bridesmaid and ordered her a large and everyone else a small. The large is the EXACT same size as the small. I’m not sure if they just labeled the wrong product. Will update when I get a new shawl sent.

Absolute perfection can't wait to wear this on my wedding day Will be the perfect staple if it will be indeed cold/chill at the end of October which I have been told. And again it'll look good on photos.
Quality is nice and the items are shrink wrapped and easy to travel to destination wedding.
I am using this product in my wedding and I am glad I bought it!! It’s super soft and great quality made. Came in an timely fashion. Highly recommend.
I got it fast it was beautiful and so soft but it had a bad smell to it so I washed it on gentle and after it dried it feels like wood it's extremely hard and not pretty anymore
I am speechless. I could not even open it as it was basically melted to the plastic (see picture). If I could give this 0 stars I would. Returning immediately.
This fur coverup was perfect for my winter wedding! I felt so elegant and beautiful, and it kept me warm during pictures.

The white and the white with black tip are both NOT white. Not even close. They’re even more creamy than ivory. I’m getting married in less than a week and both arrived today and I can’t use either one. My dress is white and grey. I attached a photo to this review. The top photo is the white with black tip photo from the product page. The bottom photo is of both shrugs I ordered. The middle bag is the white shrug I ordered for my daughter from another company. Didn’t want anyone to think I photoshopped the colors or anything. They are absolutely not white. Super sad and disappointed.

The way this is cut is too high. Being well endowed it makes me look bigger than I am. If it were cut longer (longer hand from breast area) it would fix the issue. I assume smaller chested women would do well with this.

评论概述: So nice- using it for engagement and wedding photos!
评论详情: My fiancé and I had our engagement photos taken on a cold February FL morning. I decided to purchase this as a cute fashionable way to keep warm and I’m so glad I did! I got the white with black tips. It photographed very well and was absolutely perfect! I’m a plus size girl so I bought the largest size and it also fit very well. The quality is great. No issues with the faux fur or satin lining. We’re getting married next January and I’m having my bridesmaids get these to keep warm!
My bridesmaids and I loved our beautiful wraps! Added a classy touch to my Christmas wedding. 😊

评论概述: I had to give it one star to submit my review!
评论详情: This was my worst purchase ever. It was so cheap looking. Only use would be for a kid playing dress-up. Even then, it shed terribly.

I just received this in the mail today.  I’m so happy I ordered this shawl.  My son is getting married in December and I needed a warm dressy shawl to wear around my shoulders.  The fit is perfect.  I am 5 feet tall and wear a size 10.  It is perfect for me.  I chose the small size.  It is so beautiful.  The short fur is soft and silky to the touch.  I am sooooo pleased with my purchase.  I recommend this to anyone who would like a dressy shawl for a special occasion.  I chose the black color, and it is simply gorgeous!!!
It’s very soft and seems well made. If they made a blanket out of the same material I would buy it in a minute
had softness/quality
Great great great and elegant. Only down fall is that fur may come off and get your black attire furry. But If you’re not wearing black go for it!

This is a really beautiful piece! Super soft, silky and shiny, smooth. I was hesitant about the quality but it was much better than I expected. The silk lining is also very smooth and of good quality.  It did not come totally flattened but definitely need a shake out and and comb through. I will definitely recommend. I am returning only because it is just far too big for my small shoulders.  An extra small would've done the trick.
